SimpleSerialization installation instructions
---------------------------------------------

Copy the SimpleSerialization distribution folder to your Arduino IDE:
SimpleSerialization
-> arduino-00XX\hardware\libraries

Copy the Arduino examples to your Arduino sketches folder:
SimpleSerialization\examples\SimpleSerialization
-> Arduino

Copy the Processing library to your Processing library folder:
SimpleSerialization\processing\libraries\SimpleSerialization
-> Processing\libraries

Copy the Processing examples to your Processing sketches folder:
SimpleSerialization\processing\SimpleSerialization
-> Processing
